demos.title: Geometry Sketch
demos.description: Draw geometric shapes to solve a math problem

model.prompt:
Geometry Problem: Draw a right triangle with one leg measuring 3 units and the other leg measuring 4 units. Then draw and label the hypotenuse.

Use the line tool to draw the triangle and the text tool to add labels.
model.teacherInstructions: Look for accurate right angle construction and proper labeling of all sides. The hypotenuse should be approximately 5 units based on the Pythagorean theorem.

demos.title: Creative Free Drawing
demos.description: Open-ended drawing canvas for creative expression

model.prompt:
Creative Drawing: Use the drawing tools to create an illustration of your favorite animal in its natural habitat.

You can use circles, rectangles, lines, and free drawing to create your artwork. Use the text tool to label your drawing.
model.teacherInstructions: Assess creativity, use of multiple drawing tools, and whether the student has attempted to show the animal in a habitat context.

demos.title: Plant Cell Diagram Annotation
demos.description: Label and annotate a scientific diagram with background image

model.prompt:
Biology - Cell Structure: Using the plant cell diagram provided, add labels to identify at least 5 major organelles.

Use the text tool to add labels and the line tool to draw arrows pointing to each organelle you identify.
model.teacherInstructions: Students should correctly identify at least 5 organelles such as: nucleus, cell wall, chloroplast, vacuole, mitochondria, cell membrane, endoplasmic reticulum, or Golgi apparatus. Labels should be clear and arrows should point accurately to the structures.
